ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity
Class AbstractEntity

java.lang.Object
  ca.keefer.sanemethod.Entity.AbstractEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClamMook, Coin, Crate, Door, Elevator, ExitBubble, FallingBlock, JumpingMook, Platformer, Spike, Spring, Switch, Talkable, Treadmill, Waypoint
public abstract class AbstractEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity

The common bits of all entities. A bunch of utility methods and a physical body.

Author:
Kevin Glass, Christopher Keefer
